name: Vitale #27
description: Your 1.11 carat Fancy Vivid Yellowish Orange diamond is very rare, with a rich and intense coloration. The Vivid designation indicates an exceptional intensity and saturation of colour. The orange to yellow tint in your diamond is caused by the presence of nitrogen during the formation process, resulting in the total absorption of blue light waves. Reminiscent of a glowing sunset or the comforting embrace of sunlight, the unique yellow orange hue of your diamond can evoke a feeling of coziness, comfort and warmth.

attributes.value: Fancy Vivid Yellowish Orange Natural Color
